Title: MONTE PACIS
Description:
Monte Pacis is housed in a beautiful building in the functioning monastery building and it is situated on the peninsula surrounded by the Kaunas lagoon. An almost 100-meter long linden tree alley leads to the entrance. The rooms and apartments at Monte Pacis are classically decorated in the Baroque style and each comes with a minibar and a private bathroom with a bath or a shower.Breakfast, lunch and a la carte dinner are served in restaurant and its menu is based on local and seasonal produce. The wine selection includes authentic wine made by the monks. In the summer season guests can enjoy a salad and barbeque bar open on the terrace.There is a 24-hour front desk and an airport shuttle is offered at an extra fee. The centre of Kaunas is 10 km away and so is the airport. There is a beach 300 metres away from Monte Pacis.

Title: PAS STANLEY
Description:
Welcome to our house, “your second home, away from home”! We are humble and honoured for your stay at our place – a place which, we hope, will give you a warm and friendly experience and where you want to return to! Our premier goal is hundred percent guests satisfaction, and this is not only the words, but a fact which all our acting and activities are concerned around! If we don’t fulfil this goal we are more than thankful for your advice and we will do our best to be better!“Pas Stanley” is a place where you will get food, prepared by experienced cooks from carefully selected and always fresh ingredients, for prices you do not expected. You will be served by our smiling, clever and enthusiastic waitresses, who are ready to do the best your welfare and relaxation.Cosy atmosphere and friendly staff make you feel at home, no matter from which country or any age you would be.

Title: Coffee Mate
Description:

They’re always ready to help you choose not only a coffee machine that suits your needs, but also the most delicious, high-quality coffee. Or… or simply chat over a steamy cup of coffee!Whenever you have a problem with your coffee machine The Coffee Mate’s service will take care of diagnostics, professional hygiene and repairs.P.S. In Lithuanian we are – Kavos Draugas, in United Kingdom – The Coffee Mate, in Russia - Kofe Druzya, in Deutshland – Kaffee-Kumpel, in Latvia – Kafijas Draugs, in Estonia – KohviSemu. Visit us!

Title: Jurgis ir Drakonas
Description:
Jurgis ir Drakonas was born in March 2014 as the brainchild of Tom Nicholson, husband of popular TV cook Beata Nicholson.George and Dragon make pizza for the real heroes. Real heroes understand the best quality. Authenitic Neapolitan tradition pizza is made from real Italian 00 flour. Tomatoes grown under the hot Italian sun are ripe and rich, and Italian fior di latte mozzarella melts in your mouth. All Italian sausages: Salami and Nduja are brought from Italy. Of course we use Parmigiano Reggiano. Restaurant follow Vera Pizza Neapolitano traditions and their PIZZA dough matures slowly for a better flavour.. The slow rising allows the dough to develop complex flavours and a unique taste and texture. Pizzas are baked in the authentic dome oven at 400¹C for 90 seconds.

Title: Kaukas
Bardakas
Description:
Įprastai valstybės turi turtingą istoriją - Bardakas turi bardaką.Grupelė nepasotinamų sielų, be konkretaus amžiaus ir socialinio statuso susijungė vienai gyvenimo filosofijai. Pasirašydami skyrybų raštą su nuobodą bei nubrėždami aiškią ribą - atsiskyrė nuo kasdienybės ir įkūrė savilaisvės valstybę - Bardaką.Jų valstybės sienas sutvirtina beprotiškos tradicijos, o jos piliečiai apdovanojimus gauna už drąsą pildant savo svajones, kurių Bardake neturėti yra kriminalinis nusikaltimas. Jų nacionalinę uniformą padiktuoja esama nuotaika, jų stalai skirti ne tik maistui, bet ir šokiams, jų darbas – atostogos, jų kasdienės istorijos keičia istoriją, jų įstatymai pasakoja apie jų nebuvimą, jų konstitucija aiškina apie bardaką, kuris sutvarko.Valstybė - valstybėje. Sukurta nenormalių - nenormaliems.

Title: Al Cantuccio
Description:
Italijoje vietiniai gyventojai itin vertina maisto kokybę, todėl vengia turistinių vietų ir renkasi atokesnius, nedidelius restoranus.Mažas, jaukias, pasislėpusias ir kokybišką maistą tiekiančias vietas Italijoje vadina "al Cantuccio" (liet.- kampelis). Būtent tokią patirtį kviečiame jus patirti Kaune, mažame, jaukiame, itališko maisto restorane "Al Cantuccio", pasislėpusiame visiškai šalia Rotušės aikštės.

Title: Dinner in the sky
Description:
The largest and the most modern in the Baltic countries hot air balloon accomodates up to 16 people! United team of "Amberton Air" and "Hot Air Lines" with unabashed pride presents unique in the Baltic countries flying restaurant! It is truly exceptional blend of air balloon voyage and special meal, made by one of the leading chefs of the country and offered special for You. Fly with the most modern and largest air balloon in the country, taste and enjoy, while we promise that felt impressions would definitely get You above the heaven! Air ballooning sessions are arranged in all spots of Lithuania! Participants: Service is provided for groups of 14-16 people. Duration: 1 hour of voyage (3 hours with preparation). Service includes: voyage coaching, ballooning, dinner (the first part waits for You on the ground right before the voyage, another one is served during the fly), transportation to the start point. Time: Ballooning sessions are arranged in the evening at 18-21pm. Weather conditions: Hot air balloon voyage depends on weather conditions, such as cloud age, precipitation, observability, wind power. Usually, meteorological conditions are foreseen, but sometimes the forecast may be inaccurate or incomplete. Thus, even arrived to the start point, voyage may be rescheduled due to the safety issues. Clothing: Preferably cotton, which covers the whole body. Wearing high- heeled shoes is forbidden!

Title: Second Cup
Keulė Rūkė
Jo Malonė
Description:
Jo Malonė Bakery & Chocolate Boutique by Režisierius. A concept based on one person's ongoing story, the already well-known Režisierius restaurant continues on its path through the city. It values quality, but has its weaknesses as well. Attention to detail is what defines French desserts and pastries, which some say are an art form. The exceptionally light, fluffy and delicately flavoured pastries at Jo Malonė are no exception.
